backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing a feature update for 2:3 aspect ratio image cards and listing related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the main React app into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing password unlocking, entry gating, audio state, and rendering all main content sections.
frontend/src/components/AmbientBackgroun: Canvas animation component rendering floating emoji particles across the screen.
Background audio controller with play/pause and mute buttons using an HTMLAudioElement.
frontend/src/components/BirthdayMessageP: Dialog popup containing the birthday message with animated hearts and sparkles.
frontend/src/components/EmojiHeader.tsx: Sticky animated emoji header cycling through a list of emojis.
frontend/src/components/EntryOverlay.tsx: Full‑screen entry overlay with animated hearts and a button to enter the site.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with animated background and multiple romantic text blocks.
Scrollable modal showing the full love letter using dialog and scroll-area components.
frontend/src/components/memories/ImageMe: A flip-style image memory card allowing uploads, framing adjustments, and card flipping for messages.
Manages a list of image memory cards with local storage persistence and the ability to add or update memories.
frontend/src/components/memories/VideoMe: Displays a grid of video memory tiles loaded from local storage, allowing users to upload or replace videos.
A video tile component that supports uploading or replacing a video and displays it with basic controls.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGate.tsx: A password-protected gate component that validates input and unlocks content with animated decorative UI.
Displays a surprise section with a modal love letter, birthday message, and styled romantic UI elements.
frontend/src/content/loveLetter.ts: Exports a multi‑paragraph love letter string used in the surprise section modal.
frontend/src/content/romanticMessages.ts: Exports an array of short romantic messages used for image memory cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styling, theme variables, dark mode settings, and custom component/animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/localMemoryStore.ts: Manages loading and saving image and video memory data to localStorage with simple interfaces.
frontend/src/lib/sessionFlags.ts: Handles sessionStorage flags for tracking unlocked and entered state in the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, plugins, and extended utilities for the app's design system.
project_state.json: Contains high-level project metadata, features, requirements, and architectural notes for the birthday site.
